error.message: Twig Test "divisibleby" is deprecated since version 1.21. Use "divisible by" instead in modules/contrib/twitter_trends/templates/twitter-trends.html.twig at line 27.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to twitter_trends.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
